snippet: The Mets said in a statement Thursday that they had hired CRG Partners to provide “services in connection with financial reporting and budgeting processes.”
abstract: MLB Roundup; New York Mets say they have hired CRG Partners, firm known as a turnaround specialist and bankruptcy consultant, to provide services in connection with financial reporting and budgeting processes.
lead_paragraph: The Mets said in a statement Thursday that they had hired CRG Partners to provide “services in connection with financial reporting and budgeting processes.”
